bibl.note: I. The text - including "ensemble a" of P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)]. - II. Analysis. - III. Conclusion.
